last_episode_to_air.name: Third World Championship
last_episode_to_air.overview:
The World Championship. Robots from all over the World come here to see if they can become the new World Champion. Let's get it started!

Fight 1: Spartacus II (USA) Vs Supernova (Sri Lanka) Vs Hard (Belgium)

Hard broke down and had computers dropped on it vie Drop Zone. Supernova and Spartacus were both immobile, but Supernova went through for being more mobile (and ripping off Spartacus' head! >_

name: Robot Wars
overview: Teams of amateur robot fighting enthusiasts battle it out over a series of rounds in a huge purpose-built arena aiming to become the Robot Wars Champion.

episodes.name: Celebrity Special
episodes.overview: This competition involves famous British celebrities taking the controls of Britain's most famous robots. Which celebrity will win?

episodes.name: Tag Team Terror
episodes.overview: In this competition, competitior robots work as teams. One robot fights another robot, while their partner is on the side of the arena, waiting to be tagged, but most of the time, the rules go out the window!

episodes.name: Annihilator North
episodes.overview: This is a new event containing not 1, not 2, but 6 robots all together in the arena at the same time! Every now and then a robot is eliminated. 4 battles later, there are only 2 robots left. Whoever wins the last round is the new Annihilator champion. This is carnage at its best!

The most destructive robot in the world, Hypno-Disc is back and better than ever! Can they spin to win the competition? We'll find out!

episodes.name: Robot Wars Extreme: Show 3
episodes.overview:
Fight 1: S3 Vs Plunderbird    The Plunderbird team said that Plunderbird 5 was the robot that was going to win. At the beginning of the fight, they pushed the hammer-head shark like robot around the arena into the CPZ. However, S3's vertical disc was already causing major damage to Plunderbird. Eventually, Plunderbird stopped moving. S3's disc ripped up Plunderbird's armor and disintegrating it like tin foil. Eventually the wheels fell off. Plunderbird was no more. They were flipped through the air next to the Pit and were out. S3 goes through.

Fight 2: Stinger (Seated 5th) Vs Hippobotomus   The Hippobotomus robot was built out of a hippo-shaped sand box. Because of its plastic construction, the only damage they tried to cause to Stinger was to themselves. Stinger pounded Hippobotomus again and again. The Hippo was falling apart. Dead Metal then sliced through the Hippo's cover. The fight went to the judges who decided Stinger to go through. The girl on the Hippobotomus team (She used

episodes.name: Robot Wars Extreme: Show 4
episodes.overview:
The #7 seeds, Firestorm are back. Can they go all the way?

Firestorm III   From: Durham   Weight: 100 Kilos   Weapons: Front Flipper   Strengths: Power of Weapon   Weaknesses: Poor Transmitter Reliability

Eliminators

Fight 1: Firestorm (Seeded 7th) Vs Bee-Capitator   House Robots: Matilda and Sir Killalot   Firestorm showed no mercy. They flipped Bee-Capitator over and over again and eventually into Matilda. However, Bee-Capitator slid off of Firestorm's flipper, causing Matilda's flywheel to smack fight into Firestorm's flipping arm, bending it. Fortunately, Bee-Capitator were stuck upside-down and were counted out. Sir Killalot picked Bee-Capitator up and roasted them onto the flame pit. Bee-Capitator was then pitted. A wounded Firestorm moves on to the next round.

Fight 2: Sir Chromalot Vs Rohog   House Robots: Matilda and Sir Killalot   Sir Chromalot won this fight because Rohog couldn't get their lifter working properly. Sir Chromalot flipped Rohog a few times until eventually the

episodes.name: Robot Wars Extreme: Show 5
episodes.overview: Thermidor II, the #16 seeds are back and ready for action. Can they win the UK Championship or will Wild Thing, the #9 seeds, now armed with a spinning disc, cut up lobster and throw it onto a dinner plate?

episodes.name: Robot Wars Extreme: Show 6
episodes.overview: Tonight, we have two awesome axes: Dominator II, the #11 seeds and X-Terminator 2, the #14 seeds. Which axe will go through? Can newcomers 13 Black spin the Roulette wheel and come out on top?

episodes.name: Robot Wars Extreme: Show 7
episodes.overview: Diotoir, Tornado and Spawn of Scutter. 3 names that we are familar with, but now newly improved. Tornado, the #12 seeds' ramming spike is now a 2,000 rpm spinning disc and  Spawn of Scutter, the #13 seeds, now have a new robot: Spawn Again. How will they do?

episodes.name: Robot Wars Extreme: Show 8
episodes.overview:
The hits just keep on comin'! The #15 Seeds, Behemoth is the robot that may have a chance at winning, but the robot everyone's talkin' about is Wheely Big Cheese, the #10 seeds. With the biggest flipper in the business, they're an awesome robot! Can they get a wheely big win?

Eliminators

Fight 1: Wheely Big Cheese (Seated 10) Vs Woverine   This was a very quick fight. All Wheely Big Cheese had to do was get under Wolverine and flip them out of the arena. This fight was all over in just 20 seconds! Wheely Big Cheese moves on!

episodes.name: Robot Wars Extreme: Show 9
episodes.overview: It's Heat I and thinks are already heating up. The #8 seeds, Steg 2 are back with a brand new robot, 3 Stegs 2 Heaven. Also back in this heat is the #17 seeds, Splinter, the robot who got trashed by Hypno-Disc in the Series Semi-Finals last year. The scoop is gone and is replaced with an axe, but you can't count out Bigger Brother. Ian and Joe Watts are back and this time, Joe has brought his sister, Ellie, along for the ride. Who will come out on top in this heat?

episodes.name: Robot Wars Extreme: Show 11
episodes.overview: The World Champs and #4 seeds, Razer are back! Can they win the UK Championship...or just break down again?

episodes.name: Robot Wars Extreme: Show 12
episodes.overview:
The #2 seeds, Pussycat are back! Alan and David Gribble made it all the way to the Grand Final of the 4th Wars only to lose to Chaos 2. Can they win again this year?

Pussycat   Seated: #2   From: Gloucester   Weight: 97 kilos   Weapons: Spinning Blade   Strengths: Always Lands on its Feet   Weaknesses: Exposed Tyres

The Executioner   From: Cambridgeshire   Weight: 100 kilos   Weapons: Hydrolic Cutting Blade   Strengths: Powerful Weapon   Weaknesses: Driving Ability

Twister   Weight: 100 Kilos   Weapons: Spikes, Flywheel and Flipper   Strengths: Multi

episodes.name: Robot Wars Extreme: Show 13
episodes.overview:
Fights:

Bigger Brother Vs S3   Bigger Brother simply drove underneath S3 and chucked them around the arena and eventually threw them straight out. This was a quick fight, as Bigger Brother moves on to the next round!

Chaos 2 Vs Wild Thing   Chaos 2 flipped WT over and over, shoving them and flipping them all around the arena. At one point, Wild Thing NEARLY pushed Chaos 2 down the pit! OH! It was so close! Chaos continued flipping Wild Thing around the arena. Then Wild Thing pushed Chaos 2 towards the Pit again. This time, they came so close, the smoke vent in the Pit went off! Cease was called after a few more wild flips. Chaos 2 still won on a judges' decision.

Razer Vs Spawn Again   Razer kept puncturing Spawn Again with the beak. After more and more punctures, Spawn Again then drove down the pit. How sily!

Losers' Melee   S3 Vs Spawn Again Vs Wild Thing   Spawn Again and Wild Thing were being ripped apart by S3. S3 ripped off Spawn Again's flipper blade and caused major damage to W

episodes.name: Robot Wars Extreme: Show 14
episodes.overview:
Wheely Big Cheese Vs Dominator 2   Dominator 2 was shot into the air, but, luckily went through when WBC broke down.

Firestorm Vs Hypno-Disc   Hypno-Disc killed Firestorm in one solid hit. Firestorm was flipped and pitted.

Panic Attack VS Pussycat   The #2 seeds fought strong and beat Panic Attack on a judges' decision.

Losers' Melee   Wheely Big Cheese Vs Firestorm Vs Panic Attack   WBC broke down. Firestorm beat Panic Attack on a judges' decision.

Dominantor 2 Vs Hypno-Disc   Hypno-Disc got a few hits in on Dominator, and then spent the rest of the fight doing nothing. Blah! Hypno-Disc won and moves on to the Grand Final.

Firestorm Vs. Pussycat   Firstorm moves on to the Grand Final after beating Pussycat, but their robot was a mess.

episodes.name: Robot Wars Extreme: Show 15
episodes.overview:
Fight 1: Bigger Brother Vs Hypno-Disc   In the beginning, Hypno-Disc was causing major damage to Bigger Brother, tearing off armor, wrecking the flipper, etc. And then, by accident, they drove right over the edge of the Pit! Bigger Brother, who unbelieveably was still alive, pushed them in! Bigger Brother celebrated. However, their flipper was wrecked, so all they could do was spin.

Fight 2: Firestorm Vs Razer   Firestorm slammed into Razer who dug his claw into Firestorm. Firestorm pushed Razer right past the edge of the Pit and into Sgt. Bash. Then they jammed Razer under the angle grinder. Refbot freed them. Firestorm pushed Razer into Bash again. Throughout all this, Razer was burying his claw into the scratched and dirty Firestorm again and again. Finally, Firestorm pushed Razer into Shunt just as time ran out. The fight was very close, but Razer won.

Fight 3: Playoffs: Firestorm Vs Hypno-Disc   A possible grudge match from the previous episode. Firestorm was a total mess. Their f

episodes.name: Second World Championship
episodes.overview: You can find the information for the Second World Championship in ""Robot Wars: Extreme Warriors"".

episodes.name: Armed Forces Special
episodes.overview:
Fight 1: Anvil Vs Shockwave Vs Sub-Version   Shockwave drove themselves down the Pit!

Fight 2: Mega-Hurts Vs Oblark Vs Rhino   Mega-Hurts knocked out Rhino's battery. Rhino went flying off the floor flipper. The army soldier doll that was inside the tank was thrown out and pushed onto the flamepit by Refbot! HA HA HA!

Fight 3: Anvil Vs Oblark   Anvil slammed Oblark into the arena wall. Shunt axed Oblark and flipped them over. They self-righted magnificiantly with the axe/flipper, but went a bit too far and got stuck nose down. Anvil pressed the Pit button. Oblark's flipper flew off. The fire fighters didn't have life left in their robot. They were counted out, burned by Sir Killalot and pitted.

Fight 4: Mega-Hurts Vs Sub-Version   House Robots: Shunt and Sir Killalot   The fight between the navy. Mega-Hurts was fast and nimble. Sub-Version was destructive and agressive. Their harpoons weren't working for a while, but the spinning propeller in the back was. Sub-Version eventually broke

episodes.name: Heat A
episodes.overview:
Tonight's Main Event was a Challenge Belt competition. Behemoth is a very tough robot to beat. In fact he should have been the World Champion instead of Razer! So the World Association of Robotics (WARS; no surprise) gave them the Robot Wars Challenge Belt. If they can hold on to the belt for 3 battles, they can take it home, other wise, they lose the belt.

Battle 1: Vengence Match   House Robots: Sir Killalot and Dead Metal

This was a grudge match to decide which robot was better. Stinger had a feeling they were going to win because they were seated #5 and Tornado were only seated #12. However, Tornado now had a trick up its sleeve. Their ramming spike had been replaced by a 2,000 rpm spinning disc? Terrifying!

Tornado

From: Huntington in Cambridgeshire

Weight: 97 kgs

Demensions: 0.85M X 0.7M X 0.25M

Power: 2 X 750W Motors

Weapons: Spinning Disc

Strengths: Invertable

Weaknesses: Easily Flipped    Team: Andrew Marchant - David Gamble - Bryan Moss

Stinger

From: Lincoln

episodes.name: Heat B
episodes.overview:
Tonight's Main Event was a Mayhem battle featuring 3 awesome robots: Wheely Big Cheese, Hypno-Disc and the now Razer-esque Ming III. However, the robot to look out for is definitely Hypno-Disc. Yes, they did have some problems in the Series 4 Grand Final, but now they're back and better than ever! As the show starts, we see some shocking, horrifying, out of this world scenes of Hypno-Disc absolutely demolishing other robots like Robogeddon, Stealth and Predator. Can anything stop Hypno-Disc?

Tag Team Terror: King B3 and 101 defended their Tag Team title last year despite going up against each other after beating Firestorm II and Scorpion. Can they defend their title?   House Robots: Sgt. Bash & Shunt

Diotoir   From: Dublin, Ireland   Seated: #21    Weight: 93 kilos   Dimensions: 1.17M X 1.04M X 0.39M   Power: 50cc Petrol Engine   Weapons: Wedge & Scoop   Strengths: Low Ground Clearance   Weaknesses: FLAMMABLE!   Team: Peter Redmong - Joe Gavin - Dr. Zulu

Mega Morg   From: Swansy   Weig

episodes.name: Heat C
episodes.overview:
ALL STAR: Firestorm III Vs Panic Attack   House Robots: Sir Killalot and Dead Metal

Firestorm pinned Panic Attack against the wall. Panic Attack never recovered.

ALL STAR: Behemoth Vs Hypno-Disc   House Robots: Sgt. Bash and Dead Metal

Dead Metal was given a yellow card for attacking Behemoth. When Dead Metal attacked Behemoth again, he was given a red card and sent back to his CPZ! Behemoth pushed Hypno-Disc onto the flame pit and Hypno-Disc broke down.

MAYHEM: Wild Thing Vs Arnold A. Terminegger Vs Fluffy   House Robots: Sgt. Bash and Sir Killalot

Fluffy broke down. They were placed onto the floor flipper and flipped into the Pit! Wild Thing and Arnold A. fought until time ran out. The judges decided to let Arnold A. go through to the Annihilator.

CHALLENGE BELT: Behemoth Vs Stinger   House Robots: Sir Killalot and Dead Metal (if DM attacks Behemoth, it's off to the showers)

Behemoth clamped Stinger in place with his scoop and axe and pushed Stinger into the Pit.

INTERNATIONAL INFERN

episodes.name: Heat D
episodes.overview: Tonight's main event is the Ultimate Vengeance between the World Champs, Razer and the #2 Seeds, Pussycat. In the Heat B Final in Series 4, Pussycat attacked Razer after they broke down. Not cool. Razer wants Vengeance and they'll get it, but first, an All-Star fight.

episodes.name: Heat E
episodes.overview:
Tonight's main event is the Armed Forces Special. 3 very good robots from the Royal Forces compete, but first, we should start with a few other battles like a Tag-Team qualifyer.

Fight 1: Tag Team Terror: Bigger Brother and Plunderbird 5 Vs Spawn Again and Comengetorix   Before the fight even started, Plunderbird slammed into the arena door, damaging it and the robot. So Bigger Brother got a substitute partner: Major Tom.

Bigger Brother and Major Tom Vs Spawn Again and Comengetorix   Spawn Again immediately flipped Major Tom over. Major Tom didn't have a self-righter, so they were stuck there. Bigger Brother flipped them back over, but Major Tom never moved. They were counted out, flipped and pitted. Spawn Again and Comengetorix automatically advance.

Fight 2: Mayhem: Thermidor II Vs Behemoth Vs Stinger   Thermidor flipped Stinger, then had a go at Behemoth. Suddenly, they flipped Behemoth's back end, sending the box-shaped robot sommersaulting over and over and out of the arena! Therm

episodes.name: Heat F
episodes.overview:
Plunderbird and Sir Chromalot: 2 robots with teams who are funny and cool at the same time. Okay, so their robots aren't that good, but they do hate each other. Vengeance will be settled in the Warzone tonight!!

TAG TEAM TERROR: Sumpthing & SMIDSY vs Thermidor II & Cerberus   Thermidor II was wearing a Robot Wars hat in this fight. It's amazing that his hat didn't burn up because SMIDSY and Sumpthing looked the strongest untill SMIDSY got stuck in first driver and Sumpthing got flipped onto its spikes by Thermidor II. Both robots were counted out. Thermidor II and Cerberus go through to the next round.

CHALLENGE BELT: Behemoth vs Tornado   Tornado was easily the strongest and pushed and shoved Behemoth around. Behemoth fought back later on by flipping Tornado up against the arena side wall. They reversed to try and flip Tornado out of the arena, but then Matilda came in smacked into Behemoth with her flywheel. Tornado well off the wall and continued pushing Behemoth around the arena. B

episodes.name: Heat G
episodes.overview:
The Annihalator! 6 robots go in, but only 1 robot will become the new Annihalator champion.

Fight 1: Hypno-Disc Vs Pussycat Vs Thermidor II Vs Splinter Vs Arnold A. Teeminegger Vs X-Terminator 2   All the axe robots ganged up on Hypno-Disc, including Splinter, who Hypno-Disc had destroyed in Series 4. It looked like the spin-to-winners were losing, until Splinter pushed Thermidor into the CPZ. Thermidor broke down and they were out of the Annihalator. At least we're having lobster for dinner!

Robots eliminated so far: Thermidor II

Fight 2: Once again, everyone ganged up on Hypno-Disc. The 5-minute time limit expired, but this fight wasn't over until someone was immobilized, and pretty soon someone was: X-Terminator. They wore out the batteries and broke down. Refbot counted X-Terminator out.

Robots eliminated so far: Thermidor II; X-Terminator 2

Fight 3: Hypno-Disc never got going. Pussycat pushed them down the Pit, but then Splinter pushed Pussycat down the Pit as well! Oh, well.

Robo

episodes.name: Heat I
episodes.overview: Tonight's main event is the House Robot Rebellion! The House Bots are sick and tired of being in their Corner Patrol Zones all the time and doing nothing. They want to take on someone just for fun! Who? Well, that's the problem. Everyone seems to be too scared of the House Bots. Who's brave enough to take them on? Hypno-Disc? Chaos 2? Stinger? We'll find out!

episodes.name: Heat J
episodes.overview:
It's the All Star quarter finals!

Fight 1: Chaos 2 Vs Wheely Big Cheese

Chaos 2   From: Branford, Ipswtch   Seated: #1 and Reining Champion   Weight: 83 Kilos   Demensions: 0.9M X 0.71M X 0.38M   Power: 2 X 800W Motors   Weapons: Pnumatic Flipper   Strengths: Unbeaten In Competition   Weaknesses: Limited Co2 Supply

Yes, these two teams fought before in series 3, but the team from Somerset had The Big Cheese. Wheely Big Cheese was a good robot with a big flipper, but right now, it was still recovering from ints onslaught with Hypno-Disc. Chaos 2 kept on flipping Wheely Big Cheese and it didn't seem that Wheely Big Cheese's flipper was working at full power. Chaos 2 dominated this battle and it went to the judges and they went for Chaos 2.

episodes.name: Heat K
episodes.overview:
CHALLENGE BELT: Tornado vs Wild Thing   A very close battle with both robors doing a lot of shoving and some damage to each other. It also seemed that there was more fighting in the Wild Thing roboteerng box with Isabelle and Jake Adams fighting over who was doing the weaponry controls. The battle went to the judges. The judges decided the winner on aggression and it went to Tornado and now they keep the Challenge Belt.

TAG TEAM TERROR: Diotoir and Pussycat vs Spawn Again and Comengetorix   Mega Morg was in no shape to fight, so Pussycat agreed to fight with Diotoir. Pussycat's blade wasn't working as well but it didn't stop it being aggressive. Comengetorix didn't seem to be working properly either. Spawn Again broke down and was counted out. It looked like there was only one winner, Diotoir and Pussycat! They meet Suicidal Tendencies and Steel Avenger in the final.

episodes.name: Semi Final 2
episodes.overview: It's the 2nd of the Extreme Annihalators. 6 robots go in and only one will be the champion.

episodes.name: Heat 1
episodes.overview:
The UK champs, Razer are back, also with 2 suprise guests new to the House Robot family.

At the beginning of the new 6th War, they introduced the House Robots like they always did, but then Craig announced that another robot had decided to join the House Robot family. ""Ladies and Gentlemen, boys and girls, with his bulldog Growler, meet the deadly Mr. Psycho!"" Next thing we know, the House Robot doors are opening up and out comes this enoromus robot along with a giant robot dog. Mr. Psycho and Growler then start dancing and showing off their weapons. Then their names appear in front of the screen in red letters. Robot Wars now has a new breed of House Robot: the biggest and baddest House Robots ever!

Fight 1: Brutus Maximus Vs Razer (Seated #1) Vs W.A.S.P. Vs Raging Reality   Razer buried its jaw into Brutus' wooden top, puncturing them again and again. Razer then dug his claw into Raging Reality. W.A.S.P., on the other hand, wasn't getting their spike into good use. Raging Reality pus

episodes.overview: The #3 seeds, Firestorm is back and this year, Graham Bone and Hazel Haslop have a new robot, Firestorm 4. Can they win the UK championship this time?

episodes.name: European Championship
episodes.overview:
Being a champion is cool. You win a competition in your country, and now you have decided to go international. Will you win the European competiton, or just go home, without the European championship trophey, but, will still have a trophey, right? Which one of our All-Star Champions will win the European Championship?

Semi-Final 2: Razer Vs Tornado   Razer went up against Tornado in the Semi Finals, with the series tied at 2 each. Razer was the current world champion, and Tornado the current UK champion. Both teams re-adapted their weaponry for each other, with Razer making the more impressive ""hook"". Razer successfully hoocked on to Tornado's ACC (Anti-Crushing Cage), and attempted to drag them over the pit. They got them part way over the pit, before their motors burned out. It ended going to a judges decision, and was given to Razer based on them controlling the whole fight. However, the Razer team had a discussion amongst the team members, and in a 2-1 decision, they agreed they bu

episodes.name: Heat B
episodes.overview:
Fight 1: Barbaric Response Vs Big Nipper Vs Grim Reaper Vs Kan Opener   Big Nipper and Grim Reaper both won on a judges' decision.

Fight 2: Gyrobot Vs Jackson Wallop Vs Killerkat Vs *Terrorhurtz   *Terrorhurtz were disqualified for not repairing their robot in time for the competition. The #3 seeds were out, so it was down to 3 robots. The 2 spinners ganged up on Killerkat, flipping him onto his side. He couldn't self-right. After the Ref counted Killerkat out, Gyrobot and JW pushed Killerkat onot the flamepit. Killerkat was wearing fur. (Jayne said it would go up like a match) Within the flames was a small heart. It said ""I love Matilda"". Jonathan Pearce said ""Well you won't see her."" Killerkat was pushed onto the floor flipper and shot through the air.

Special Event: Featherweight Melee   House Robots: Mr. Psycho and Sir Killalot and GROWLER?!   This fight was wrong on so many levels! They had the 3 massive super heavweight robots (shown above) who all ganged up on the poor itty bitt

episodes.name: Heat C
episodes.overview: YES! The #5 seeds, the robot that ended Chaos 2's career is here! Dantomkia, an awesome robot with a really awesome flipper. (Shame about the driver though). Can Dantomkia win this year and take home the money? episodes.name: Heat D
episodes.overview:
The #7 Seeds, 13 Black are back and ready to win! Unlucky for some, will 13 Black be lucky?

Fight 1: 13 Black Vs Herbinator Vs Lightning Vs The Alien   House Robots: Sgt. Bash and Shunt   13 Black wasn't doing a whole lot of moving in this fight. Herbinator was already on its side and immobilized by Lightning at the start of the fight. Lightning pushed 13 Black towards the pit. Both robots nearly fell in! Herbinator was counted out and axed by Shunt. Lightning then flipped 13 Black against the side wall, but Alien had been immobilized as well. They were pushed onto the Drop Zone, where a large buoy fell down on top of it. Cease was called and 13 Black and Lightning move on!

Fight 2: Gravity Vs Hodaf the Bad Vs Hydra Vs Thor   House Robots: Cassius Chrome and Sgt Bash   This fight was unbelieveable. Gravity, the awesome Dutch flipper robot was launching Hydra all around the arena. Thor rammed Hodaf into the arena wall. Gravity then tried to flip Hydra out of the arena! Hydra went flying

episodes.name: Heat E
episodes.overview: The UK champs, Tornado are back and now have new interchangable weapons: A spinning drum (like the disc, only fatter), an electric lifter, and the scoop now equiped with a spinning chain weapon. Can they blow away the competition? We'll soon find out!

episodes.name: Heat F
episodes.overview:
X-Terminator, the #11 seeds are back! Remember they had that axe? Well, now they have built a brand new robot. A pyramid shaped robot with a large 1500 RPM spinning disc! AWESOME! Can they win the 7th Wars and take home the 5,000?

Fight 1: Diabolus Vs Major Tom Vs Tsunami (German Entry) Vs X-Terminator (seated 11)   This fight didn't last very long. At the start of the fight, Major Tom's head predictably fell off! X-Terminator then used their new spinning disc, ripping up Diabolus and sending their spinning disc flying off. The German robot, Tsunami then flipped Major Tom out of the arena and into the Plexiglass wall! Then X-Terminator continued ripping up Diabolus and threw them against the arena side wall. Tsunami flipped Diabolus out as well! YEAH! X-Terminator and Tsunami move on to the next round!

episodes.name: Heat H
episodes.overview:
Fight 1: Ming Dienasty (Seeded 15) Vs Ceros Vs Scraptosaur Vs Metalis   House Robots: Dead Metal and Growler   At the start of the match Ceros flipped the #15 seeds, Ming Dienasty over. Ming tried to use their drill to self-right, but had a little trouble. Scraptosaur then flipped Metalis over. Ming was finally able to self-right, but Metalis couldn't. Refbot counted them out. Ming dug their drill into Scraptosaur, but then Ceros flipped them again and pressed the Pit release button. The Refbot pushed Metalis down the pit just as time ran out. The judges decided to let Ceros and Scraptosaur go through.

Fight 2: Revolution 3 Vs St Agro Vs Scrapper Vs Mega Hurts LT   House Robots: Dead Metal and Growler   St. Agro flipped Mega Hurts over, but Mega Hurts was able to self-right. However they drove sideways over the flame pit, burning out their motors. St. Agro then chucked Scrapper out of the arena. Revolution pushed Mega Hurts into Growler who spun a 360 with Mega Hurts in his grasp. Revo

The World Championship. Robots from all over the World come here to see if they can become the new World Champion. Let's get it started!
